verses.verse: Who is like the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3045>man?<s%> And who knows the <S%H6592>interpretation<s%> of a <S%H1697>thing?<s%> A <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> makes his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H215>shine,<s%> and the <S%H5797>hardness<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H8132>changed.<s%>

<S%H926>Don't<s%> be hasty to go <S%H3212>out<s%> of his <S%H6440>presence.<s%> <S%H5975>Don't<s%> persist in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> for he <S%H6213>does<s%> whatever pleases <S%H2654>him,<s%>
for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H7983>supreme.<s%> Who can <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> "What are you doing?"

Whoever <S%H8104>keeps<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> shall not <S%H3045>come<s%> <S%H1697>to<s%> <S%H7451>harm,<s%> and <S%H2450>his<s%> wise <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H4941>procedure.<s%>
For there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H4941>procedure<s%> for every <S%H2656>purpose,<s%> although the <S%H7451>misery<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is heavy on <S%H7227>him.<s%>
For he <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know that which will <S%H5046>be;<s%> for who can tell him how it will be?

There is no <S%H120>man<s%> who has <S%H7989>power<s%> over the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H3607>contain<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> neither does he have <S%H7983>power<s%> over the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%> There is no <S%H4917>discharge<s%> in <S%H4421>war;<s%> neither shall <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> those who practice <S%H1167>it.<s%>

All this have I <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H5414>applied<s%> my <S%H3820>mind<s%> to every <S%H4639>work<s%> that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> There is a <S%H6256>time<s%> in which one <S%H120>man<s%> has <S%H7980>power<s%> over another to his <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6912>buried.<s%> Indeed they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1980>also<s%> from <S%H4725>holiness.<s%> They <S%H935>went<s%> and were <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> where they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H1892>this.<s%> This also is vanity.

Because <S%H6599>sentence<s%> against an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> is not <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4120>speedily,<s%> therefore the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is fully <S%H4390>set<s%> in them to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Though a <S%H2398>sinner<s%> <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H7451>crimes<s%> a hundred <S%H3967>times,<s%> and lives <S%H748>long,<s%> yet surely I <S%H3045>know<s%> that it will be <S%H2896>better<s%> with those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> who are <S%H3372>reverent<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

But it shall not be <S%H2896>well<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> neither shall he <S%H748>lengthen<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> like a <S%H6738>shadow;<s%> because he <S%H6440>doesn't<s%> <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1892>vanity<s%> which is <S%H6213>done<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that there are <S%H6662>righteous<s%> men to whom it <S%H5060>happens<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> <S%H3426>Again,<s%> there are <S%H7563>wicked<s%> men to whom it <S%H5060>happens<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> that this <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

Then I <S%H7623>commended<s%> <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> because a <S%H120>man<s%> has no better <S%H2896>thing<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> than to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and to be <S%H8055>joyful:<s%> for that will <S%H3867>accompany<s%> him in his <S%H5999>labor<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> him under the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

When I <S%H5414>applied<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6045>business<s%> that is <S%H6213>done<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> (for also there is that neither <S%H3117>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>),

then I <S%H7200>saw<s%> all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3201>can't<s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> <S%H7945>however<s%> much a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5998>labors<s%> to seek it <S%H1245>out,<s%> yet he <S%H4672>won't<s%> find <S%H2450>it.<s%> Yes even though a wise man <S%H559>thinks<s%> he can <S%H3045>comprehend<s%> <S%H3201>it,<s%> he won't be able to find <S%H4672>it.<s%>
